thread.title: Very nice - would definitely stay here again :)
thread.title_full: Very nice - would definitely stay here again :) - Review of Ibis Styles London Leyton, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andreea R
title: Very nice - would definitely stay here again :)
text:
The room is quite small but includes all your necessities. Also, it was a bit far from the Walthamstow Central Underground, aprox. 15 minutes walk. However, from there you have the Victoria line which takes you in no more than 20 minutes in the city center.
The hotel looks very nice and clean. The staff are friendly and helpful. The room is modern, has new furniture and appliances, good WIFI, comfy bed and also a desk if needed. You have enough space under the bed to place your trolleys, air conditioning is functioning properly and the bathroom is also very nice and clean.
